overview.en: Avatar Network is an EOS based professional identity network, which runs in a decentralized mode, driven by smart contract. In Avatar Network all the professionals and companies can meet, recruit and interact safely, trustfully and efficiently.
overview.zh: Avatar Network是一个基于EOS的去中心化职业身份网络。通过去中心化地存储职业人士的身份数据，Avatar使得所有职场人士和公司都可以安全，可靠和高效地数据存储流转，招聘和互动。
